name: sunline
description: A lightweight script and log management tool

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE.description: Active Storage service to use (amazon or local).

AWS_BUCKET.description: S3 bucket name (required if ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE is amazon).

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key (required if ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE is amazon).

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key (required if ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE is amazon).

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region (required if ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE is amazon).

OMNIAUTH_GITHUB_ORGANIZATION.description: GitHub organization name to restrict login (optional).
